MovieRulz2 is an illegal website that provides you the facility to download or online watch the newest movies, TV shows, and Web series in Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, Hindi, English language for free. The main role of this site is to piracy.

The most important thing about this site is that a movie is uploaded to this site as soon as it arrives at the cinema hall. Many times it happens that the movies are uploaded before it’s released.

This website has been designed to keep the mobile phone users in mind. According to many reports, this site is operated from an unknown location.

They register many Domain Names together and if the government blocks one domain name then they continue their work through another domain name. This site has a Team with well-trained members to carry out this type of illegal work.
